Interface ISVGRenderOptions

interface ISVGRenderOptions {
    accuracy?: number;
    annotate?: boolean;
    className?: string;
    cssStyle?: string;
    fill?: string;
    fillRule?: "evenodd" | "nonzero";
    flow?: IFlowAnnotation;
    fontSize?: string;
    layerOptions?: Record<string, ISVGElementRenderOptions>;
    origin?: IPoint;
    scale?: number;
    scalingStroke?: boolean;
    stroke?: string;
    strokeWidth?: string;
    svgAttrs?: IXmlTagAttrs;
    units?: string;
    useSvgPathOnly?: boolean;
    viewBox?: boolean;
}
